title: Oven baked chicken breasts with herby crumb topping
ingredients: ['4 chicken breasts, boned and skinned', '1 tablespoon Dijon mustard (optional) or melted butter', 'salt and black pepper', '50g fresh breadcrumbs', '1 tablespoon dried herbs (I used Italian herbs last night - but you can ring the changes!)', '2 tablespoons butter, melted']
